body.raw:
version: "2.0"

intents:
  - faq
  - chitchat
  - request_appointment_details

slots:
  user_name:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false
  user_phone:
    type: text
    influence_conversation: false  

responses:
  utter_faq/time_required:
  - text: After any surgical procedure requiring general anesthesia, your pet will remain hospitalized overnight, under the care of our ICU doctors and staff. In the morning, we will discuss your pet’s progress with you. At that time, we will advise whether your pet can safely be discharged, or whether continued hospital care is recommended.
  utter_faq/visiting_hours:
  - text: "Monday- Friday: 12:00 PM – 3:00 PM or 8:30 PM – 9:00 PM and Saturday and Sunday: 12:00 PM – 3:00 PM"
  utter_chitchat/ask_name:
  - image: "https://i.imgur.com/zTvA58i.jpeg"
    text: Hello, my name is Vet Bot.
  - text: I am called Vet Bot!
  utter_chitchat/ask_human:
  - text: I am a bot!
  utter_ask_user_name:
  - text: What is your name?
  utter_ask_user_phone:
  - text: What is Phone number?
  utter_submit:
  - text: Your appointment has been received.
  utter_slots_values:
  - text: "With the details name:{user_name} phone:{user_phone}"
  
actions:
- utter_slots_values
- utter_submit



forms:
  appointment_form:
    user_name:
      - type: from_text
    user_phone:
      - type: from_text



session_config:
  session_expiration_time: 60
  carry_over_slots_to_new_session: true


nlu:
  - intent: faq/time_required
    examples: |
      - How long will my pet have to stay in the hospital?
      - What is the total time I need to spend in hospital?
      - How long it takes to address the pet concern?
  - intent: faq/visiting_hours
    examples: |
      - What are the visiting hours?
      - What are the hospital timings? 
      - When can I make a visit? 
      - Please give me the operating hours of hospital
  - intent: chitchat/ask_name
    examples: |
      - What is your name?
      - May I know your name?
      - What do people call you?
      - Do you have a name for yourself?
  - intent: chitchat/ask_human
    examples: |
      - Are you human?
      - Are you a real person?
  - intent: request_appointment_details
    examples: |
      - I want to book appointment

rules:

- rule: respond to FAQs
  steps:
  - intent: faq
  - action: utter_faq

- rule: respond to chitchat
  steps:
  - intent: chitchat
  - action: utter_chitchat

- rule: Activate Form
  steps: 
  - intent: request_appointment_details
  - action: appointment_form
  - active_loop: appointment_form
  
- rule: Submit form
  condition:
  - active_loop: appointment_form
  steps:
  - action: appointment_form
  - active_loop: null
  - slot_was_set:
    - requested_slot: null
  - action: utter_submit
  - action: utter_slots_values


language: en

pipeline:
  - name: WhitespaceTokenizer
  - name: RegexFeaturizer
  - name: LexicalSyntacticFeaturizer
  - name: CountVectorsFeaturizer
  - name: CountVectorsFeaturizer
    analyzer: char_wb
    min_ngram: 1
    max_ngram: 4
  - name: DIETClassifier
    epochs: 100
  - name: EntitySynonymMapper
  - name: ResponseSelector
    epochs: 100
    retrieval_intent: faq
  - name: ResponseSelector
    epochs: 100
    retrieval_intent: chitchat    
  - name: FallbackClassifier
    threshold: 0.3
    ambiguity_threshold: 0.1

policies:
  - name: RulePolicy

request.description:
Request data is copied content of *.yml(nlu, rules, domain etc.)
 
Response(model path+name) of this request is supposed to be used in req paylod for ReplaceModel request.

body.raw:
stories:
- story: My story
  steps:
  - intent: greet
  - action: utter_chitchat/ask_name

request.description: model_file value can be obtained from response of TrainModel request.
